title: Twitter : top mentioned hashtags of the Oscars 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
Out of all 2 groups, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions in Hashtags #Oscars and Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
Among all the Hashtagss, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 in Hashtags #Oscars and lowest value 26829.0 in Hashtags #OSCARS.
There is a gap of 1960910.0 between the highest and lowest Number of mentions found for Retweets in Hashtags #Oscars and #OSCARS.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of mentions on the Y-axis for 10 different Hashtagss for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions in Hashtags #Oscars and Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
Out of all 2 groups, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions in Hashtags #Oscars and Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
Among all the Hashtagss, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 in Hashtags #Oscars and lowest value 26829.0 in Hashtags #OSCARS.
There is a gap of 1960910.0 between the highest and lowest Number of mentions found for Retweets in Hashtags #Oscars and #OSCARS.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 among the 2 groups and in #WinnerIsDJT, Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions 855.0.
In Hashtags #Oscars, Retweets had the maximum Number of mentions and it saw the lowest in Hashtags #OSCARS out of all 10 Hashtagss.
The maximum Number of mentions for Retweets that was found in Hashtags #Oscars was 74.09 times larger than the minimum Number of mentions observed in Hashtags #OSCARS.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of mentions was found in case of Tweets.
Averaging all 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets, the Hashtags #Oscars is the maximum Number of mentions and #OSCARS is the minimum Number of mentions.
